author: palladia
body:
Add support for multi-line input.  

When recalling a command that's multi-line, the display is currently slightly messed up.  If this gets approved, I will open a new bug to address that scenario.

comments.author: palladia
comments.body: Should also create a bug to support Ctrl-C, to abort command-input (both single and multi-line).

comments.author: ealexjordan
comments.body: Tested this out, definitely saw inability to ctrl-c out of this and odd graphical bugs relating to repeating the buffer and cursor position on occassion, but sounds like these are issues that will be addressed, and this at least gives us a workaround way of getting multiline. :+1:

title: Add support for multi-line input
